channel.title: hypervisor on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in hypervisor on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
QEMU Logo
QEMU is a free and open-source hypervisor. It emulates the machine’s processor through dynamic binary translation and provides a set of different hardware and device models for the machine, enabling it to run a variety of guest operating systems. It could interoperate with Kernel-based Virtual Machine to run virtual machines at near-native speed. QEMU can also do emulation for user-level processes, allowing applications compiled for one architecture to run on another.
You can download theQEMUlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: QEMU
item.description: QEMU is a free and open-source hypervisor. It emulates the machine’s processor through dynamic binary translation and provides a set of different hardware and device models for the machine, enabling it to run a variety of guest operating systems. It could interoperate with Kernel-based Virtual Machine to run virtual machines at near-native speed. QEMU can also do emulation for user-level processes, allowing applications compiled for one architecture to run on another.
